description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pablo's Fruit is a simple arcade adventure game with more than 20 levels, great graphics, chip music and more On each levels,take all fruit and go to exit.There are some monsters who prevent to collect fruit. When take all fruit.Counter fruit will flashing.It prevent to go to exit. Features: -Over 20 Levels -Continue support with enterring Password -Option music Sound fx on/off
